## Main functions

`renv::init()`: Initialize renv. After downloading or starting a project

`renv::restore()`: When you open someone's project

`renv::install()`: To install a package. Accepts specific versions

`renv::status()`: Check package status

`renv::snapshot()`: Takes a snapshot of installed packages
